Package com.blukii.infosdk

blukii library for discovery and resolving of BluetoothLE (BLE) modules.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlukiiClient.OnDiscoveryListener
    Callback interface for the BLE discovery.
    BlukiiClient.OnResolveInputElementListener
    Callback interface for resolving of one single element.
    BlukiiClient.OnResolveServerNewsListener
    Callback interface for retrieving a translated blukii Info Manager news text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeaconSensorData
    Read only data object for sensor data that is emitted by blukii beacons BeaconSensorData values are part of DiscoveryData.
    BlukiiClient
    Main controller class for discovering BLE modules and resolving blukii concerned data from the blukii Info Manager.
    DiscoveryData
    Read only data object for emitted data of one Bluetooth LE (BLE) module.
    DiscoverySettings
    Property set of settings to configure the discovering process.
    EddystoneData
    Read only data object for Eddystone data that is emitted by beacons See Eddystone specification at https://github.com/google/eddystone/blob/master/protocol-specification.md EddystoneData can contain data of unencrypted EddyStone UID, URL and TLM.
    FeatureValidator
    Helper class to validate application and mobile device features
    IBeaconData
    Read only data object for iBeacon data that is emitted by beacons See iBeacon specification at https://developer.apple.com/ibeacon IBeaconData values are part of DiscoveryData.
    InputElement
    Data object that defines the input data for resolving requests to blukii Info Manager (https://manager.blukiiinfo.com).
    OutputElement
    Read only data object for data of BLE discovery and resolving process.
    ResolveData
    Read only data object for resolved output data of the blukii info manager ResolveData can be valid for blukii modules only.
    ResolveSettings
    Property set of settings to configure the resolving process of data from blukii Info Manager (https://manager.blukiiinfo.com).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlukiiClient.ErrorCode
    Error codes for discovery and resolver
    BlukiiClient.InfoCode
    Info codes for discovery
    InputSourceType
    Definition of available input types for the resolving process.
    OutputElement.ResolveState
    State of resolving process.
    OutputType
    Definition of available output types that can be chosen for a blukii number on blukii Info Manager (https://manager.blukiiinfo.com).

Package com.blukii.infosdk Description

blukii library for discovery and resolving of BluetoothLE (BLE) modules.

This documentation describes the blukii infosdk library for scanning and retrieving information of BLE modules especially for blukiis.

On the whole the library supports you by doing the following actions:
  • Discovery of modules inside the mobile device BLE range and reading protocol based information:
    • Basic values like module name, RSSI value and discovery time
    • blukii specific advertising like battery, power and firmware
    • blukii InfoBeacon sensor data
    • Eddystone beacon protocol data
    • iBeacon beacon protocol data

  • Resolving of blukiis (by blukii number) by requesting data from the blukii Info Manager(https://manager.blukiiinfo.com)
  • Getting news from the blukii Info Manager


Getting started:

The main controller for all actions is class BlukiiClient. You only have to create an instance of this class to get all the functionality.

Follow the instructions of the BlukiiClient documentation page where you can find some code samples about the usage.
